QuestData.Title: End of the Line
QuestData.Description: I cannot call Suramar my home any more, and I refuse to become a withered abomination. There is no place for me anymore, don't you understand?$b$bWe only need one last ingredient to complete the elixir. You will help me, won't you?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Thaedris at the upper landing of Tel'anor.
QuestData.CompletionText: Please let me fulfill my wishes, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: Your arguments are not without merit, $n. But I remain steadfast.
